title: Salmon ravioli
description: Equipment: You'll need a pasta machine for this recipe.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz king scallop meat or 2-3 king scallops, removed from their shells and cleaned
4 tbsp sesame oil (not toasted sesame oil)
2.5cm/1in piece fresh ginger, peeled and sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3-4 pinches micro-cresses (optional), available from some supermarkets
